To use SayItAlarm, the following permissions are required: 

 Essential: 
	• RecordAudio(Mic): Recommend selecting "Allow only while using the app". 
	• Notification 

 Optional: 
	• Music and Audio: You can choose audio files to use as alarm sounds.

Have you ever wanted your first waking thought to be about something you deeply desire? or Have you ever wanted to start a day with a bit more passion?

 To me, all the time SayIt helped me, I wish it could help you too. It's all about SayIt, but If I may add something more…

 SayIt is an open-source project. You can read the entire application code on GitHub.

 As SayIt does not collect any data, it's hard to identify problems. Please report any issues by writing a review on Google Play or emailing me.

 Also, I like to receive emails if you have anything to tell me. Please feel free to email me.

 Love,
 Mima
